not_found.parragraph2: Page you are trying to access is unavailable or has been moved.
not_found.parragraph3: Try returning to the home page.

login.error-login: An error has occurred while you were trying to access, please retry later.

error.load-data: An error has occurred while data was loading, please retry later.
error.change-state: An error has occurred changing the link status, please retry again later.

modal-inactivate.title: ¿Are you sure to disable the link?
modal-inactivate.description: If you inactivate this link every time someone uses it, it will redirect to the page not available.

modal-activate.title: ¿Are you sure to enable the link?
modal-activate.description: If you activate this link it will be available again to the people with whom you shared it.

error.txt-url-invalid: The URL format is invalid. Make sure to include http:// or https://
error.add-link: An error has occurred while saving your shortened link, please retry later.

error.title: Something's wrong here.
error.description: This is a 404 - not found error, which means you've clicked on a bad link or entered an invalid URL.
error.note: Remembear that short links are case sensitive.
